definition: pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)

sentences.english: It extends posteriorly between the orbits and otic capsules to the foramen magnum.
sentences.chinese: 它在眼窝与耳囊到枕骨大孔之间向后延伸。

sentences.english: Its length from occiput to muzzle is greater than the width at the brow.
sentences.chinese: 从枕骨部到吻部的长度大于额头的宽度。

sentences.english: The skull is well domed , showing a pronounced occipital protuberance.
sentences.chinese: 头骨是半球形的，枕骨凸起十分明显。

sentences.english: The skull broad and the occipital bone not too prominent.
The skull should be fairly long, slightly domed at occiput, with cranium broad and full.
sentences.chinese: 头部相对较长，后枕骨略微圆拱，头盖骨宽而丰满。

sentences.english: The occipital protuberance was well developed.
The brainstem enters and exits the skull through this hole; in great apes, it is positioned more towards the back of the skull.
sentences.chinese: 脑干通过枕骨大孔进出头骨。

sentences.english: Objective To describe microsurgical anatomy of the extreme lateral transcondylar approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨经远外侧枕骨髁入路的显微外科解剖。

sentences.english: Skull. The skull is well domed, showing a pronounced occipital protuberance.
sentences.chinese: 略微圆拱，后枕骨明显的突出。

sentences.english: Muzzle - The length of the muzzle from nose to stop is slightly shorter than the length from the stop to occiput.
sentences.chinese: 口吻的长度比从止部到后枕骨的距离略短。

sentences.english: Malformation of the craniocervical region, also known as malformation of the foramen magnum region, relates to many diseases.
sentences.chinese: 颅颈部畸形叉称枕骨大孔区畸形，涉及的疾病较多。

sentences.english: Objective:to provide an anatomical base for clinical application of periosteum flap of occipital bone.
sentences.chinese: 为枕骨骨膜瓣的临床应用提供解剖学基础。

sentences.english: It is the occipital chakra that governs and directs the energy flow of the dream of the Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 正是枕骨脉轮，管辖并引导着菩萨级别梦想的能量流。

sentences.english: In other words, the fetal occiput is directed towards the mother's left, anterior side.
sentences.chinese: 换言之就是胎儿枕骨位于母亲骨盆左前侧。

sentences.english: Occipital bone comprises compact os integumentale.
sentences.chinese: 枕骨主要为致密的皮质骨。

sentences.english: Occipital screws also associated with the potential for intracranial complications.
sentences.chinese: 枕骨螺钉也有引起颅内并发症的潜在风险。

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
trapezius muscle (of the upper back and neck)
